The image accompanying the claim was fou: depicting Brenda Lee being removed from an area near Air Force One.
The accompanying caption contained multi: including the claim that Brenda Lee was removed from Air Force One by order of President Obama due to her pro-life beliefs.
Brenda Lee: a self-proclaimed Catholic priestess and columnist for the Georgia Informer, was removed from the press area by airport security for refusing to cooperate with the security detail or a White House staffer who offered to take her letter to President Obama. She claimed that she was being discriminated against because of her religious beliefs.
